mainText:
Although I never meant Steve Jobs, I feel as if I knew him.  My  
emotions have come over me as if he was family.   And knowing that  
such a great man has passed, leaves me deeply saddened.  I find some  
comfort in knowing his legacy will forever be remembered.  But life on  
this Earth just doesn't feel the same without him.

I'll miss you Steve.
author: Anonymous
